sentences.en: Are you ready to plead against the case offered by the defendant?
sentences.cn: 你准备好反驳辩护人提出的问题了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He appeared before the committee to plead his case.
sentences.cn: 他出现在委员会上为他的案子辩护。

sentences.en: He appeared before the Committee to plead his case.
sentences.cn: 他出现在委员会面前为自己辩护。

sentences.en: He must at once plead guilty to the charge brought against him.
sentences.cn: 他应该对提出来的指控立即认罪.

sentences.en: He tried his best to plead for the defendent.
I do not plead any extenuating act.
sentences.cn: 我不求宽大,也不要求减刑.

sentences.en: I don't come here to plead for the Chrysler Corporation.
sentences.cn: 我到这里来不是为了替克莱斯勒公司求情.

sentences.en: It was no defence to plead that they were only obeying orders.
sentences.cn: 辩称他们只是在服从命令站不住脚。

sentences.en: Mr. Jones will plead for you in this case.
sentences.cn: 在此案中,琼斯先生将为你辩护.

sentences.en: Prisoner at the bar, do you plead guilty or not guilty?
sentences.cn: 接受审讯的刑事被告, 你认罪不认罪?

sentences.en: She stayed home from work, pleading illness.
They will plead with him to pull back from confrontation.
sentences.cn: 他们将请求他退出冲突。

sentences.en: Though her voice was toneless, it plead more loudly than words.
sentences.cn: 她的声音尽管听起来很平谈, 但比大声的要求更加诚恳.

sentences.en: To this crime we plead guilty.
We can't try this man; he is mentally unfit to plead.
sentences.cn: 我们不能审问这个人; 他的精神状况不适于辩解.

sentences.en: You Honour, I ask no mercy and I plead for no immunity.
sentences.cn: 阁下, 我不求宽大,也不求豁免.

words.tran_cn: 以...作为答辩;以...为理由;以...为借口

trans.tran_en: to argue in support of sb/sth
to ask for something that you want very much, in a sincere and emotional way

trans.tran_cn: 以…为理由，陈述案情，申辩，认罪，辩护
trans.tran_en: If you plead the case or cause of someone or something, you speak out in their support or defence
